attributes.action: HELP SAVE LIVES OF PEOPLE OF MARIUPOL
attributes.additional_details: Without the support thousands of innocent people will die.
attributes.background: We are terrified and very fearful for the lives of innocent children, elderly, man and women living under the siege of  Mariupol in inhumane conditions  without water, food, medicine and heat. Our children, sisters, brothers, parents  friends must be evacuated and provided with necessary assistance

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Urge UN to provide safe evacuation routes from war zone in Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610069

Help Ukrainian refugees and create a safe path for them to get to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574

Pledge any necessary military support to defend Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607314
